Text:
While she debates with herself, the footsteps
continue to get closer.

(If they are bandits, I can take them on alone.
If they are only bandits...!)

(How many sets of footsteps are getting closer? Wait!
They aren't just coming from below...?)

(More than that...the noise they are making, it isn't
the sound of bandits with cheap armor.)

Isn't this...the sound of metal armor? I have a
bad feeling that...they aren't bandits. This was
predictable in a pretty crappy way...

Without searching the whole castle, I just decided
they were bandits based on the little intel I had
seen...!

I completely failed to follow Lady Alpha's orders...
Well, I will deal with my regrets later!

Trying to give them the slip isn't working...
I will just have to cut my way through them.
But, there are so many.
Can I do this...?

To escape I have to cut open a path. I can do this.
I can do this... I can do it!

Intently brandishing her sword, as if to rouse
herself, she cuts down a pursuing enemy and
continues forward.
But, there is no hiding her fatigue.

My sword is getting heavy...and I'm losing my sense
of direction with this fighting...just a little bit more...
A bit more and there should be an exit...

They just keep coming... You guys are injured,
how about taking a break!

Huff, huff...huff, screw you...are none of you...
Scared to die?!

I am ready to give up my life in order to help Master
Shadow.

I said such a foolish thing to Lady Alpha...but...no,
I'm not ready to die yet...I don't want to die, I don't
want to! I have finally found my purpose for living,
I don't want to die!

I...want to be by...Master Shadow's side...more...
I want to make tea...for him...

I...want to live...and go back...to Master Shadow...
To everyone!

Still brandishing her sword while stumbling forward,
Epsilon keeps moving.

I've...reached my limit. There will be enemies...
Behind this door...this is the end...my strength
is...all spent.

She goes through the doors while practically
falling down, and on the other side she sees—

Your report ends with, "I opened the door, and found
the floor covered in the bodies of Cult soldiers."

You must be worn out, Epsilon. Your normally
immaculate face is a mess with fatigue and
dirt. You should rest for today.

Yes? Is there something else you would like to
report?

That last door...all those defeated enemies...you did
that, didn't you Lady Alpha?
I have no idea what you mean.

No one else comes to mind apart from Master Shadow
and Lady Alpha...no one else has such overwhelming
strength and brilliant skills...
It is not a matter of concern.
...Huh?

You ascertained that the ruined castle was a base of
the Cult, and returned home safely. That is enough.

You told me, remember? Shadow saved your life, so you
are willing to give it up for Shadow.

You know, we were all possessed, all of us have faced
death at least once.
...Yes.
But Shadow gave us new lives, and a reason to live.

So, it is fine to be prepared to die, but don't throw
your life away so lightly. Shadow does not want us
to give up our lives in futility.
You mean don't die for nothing...?

Yes. If you want to help Shadow, then live. Return
home to us no matter what. That is all I have to say.
I'm sorry, I...

I was overconfident, I didn't follow your orders.
I was selfish... I understand now, I still lack
experience.

You grew up a little just by learning that lesson.
Epsilon, do you now understand why I didn't put
you on important missions?
Because I'm inexperienced...?

No, that is not the reason. Up until now you felt you
could do more, that you are able to do more.

I could see your pent-up impatience just from looking
at you, I became afraid that your impatience would
lead to you losing your life.
That's why.

But, if you have now realized your own inexperience,
from now on I will put you on more important missions.
What's wrong? Are you not happy?

...I-It's nothing! I will work harder! I want to
be of help to you and Master Shadow!
